meanings.definition: A distinct part or portion of something.
meanings.sent1: The book is divided into several sections for easier reading.
meanings.sent2: She tore off a section of the paper to use for her notes.
meanings.sent3: The sections of the puzzle were so small that it was hard to see where they fit.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was split into sections, each one holding a different emotion.
meanings.sent5: The sections of the orange were neatly arranged on the plate, ready to be eaten.

meanings.definition: A division or segment of a larger entity.
meanings.sent1: The store has a special section for toys in the back.
meanings.sent2: The report is divided into different sections for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The sections of the cake were so big that everyone got a huge slice.
meanings.sent4: The city was divided into sections, each with its own unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The sections of the map were color-coded to show different regions clearly.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things with a common characteristic or feature.
meanings.sent1: The science fiction section of the library is my favorite.
meanings.sent2: The sections of the choir sang in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The sections of the team worked together to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent4: The sections of the forest were filled with different types of trees.
meanings.sent5: The sections of the museum showcased art from different time periods.
